name: 心がわり
summary:
"Spring… Every spring I remember Mom hugging me in the park as I stared at the blooming sakura trees over her shoulder…"

A time when the transient flowers slowly shed their petals, spring has come once again, and is a season filled with memories for Matsubayashi Asami who starts her fourth year at university.

Aware of her mother’s struggles during the divorce thirteen years ago, she is determined to graduate smoothly to finally enter the workforce and repay her mother who raised her single-handedly.

But love is unpredictable, and time and time again, her heart is moved. Through these experiences, will her cynical attitude toward love and marriage change for the better or will it break her further…?

What is forgiveness to her…?

Kokorogawari, a human drama story.
